name: Delugeional
description:
Lost in the mountains in the freezing rain; get to higher ground before the flood sweeps you away.

This game was made for a 24 hour game jam at SNHU under the theme "Rain". This game placed 1st, and also won the award for best use of theme.

The Team:

Programming:
-Nicole Iovanna
-Ryan Feeney

Art:
-Will Cotto

Level Design:
-Maxen McCoy
